Find my talk live on Facebook # CongrèsPS https://t.co/uGUiESXMIe
You prove it again, the strength of the PS, it is its militants. # CongrèsPS
We are mobilized and we are facing. Today the PS takes strong measures. # CongrèsPS
The measures discussed at the PS have two concerns: to reinforce ethics and reoxygenate democracy. # CongrèsPS
It is not the aggressiveness, even the hatred, of some of our adversaries who will shoot us down. # CongrèsPS
When I see the surge of insults towards the socialists, my energy is increased tenfold. # CongrèsPS
Without the PS at the govt, workers' rights and social gains in all areas will be gradually destroyed. # CongrèsPS
We must, despite adversity, continue to be the bulwark against neoliberal hegemony. # CongrèsPS
As of today, all socialist agents know that the decumulation of income is a reality. # CongrèsPS
The PS is a solid party. We have been around since 1885. For over 130 years we have been fighting for a more just world. # CongrèsPS
In these difficult times, fellowship and fraternity must allow us to keep our heads high. Socialism never dies!
Each generation is experiencing hardships, and we are facing an important test right now. # CongrèsPS
